reviewText: A Christian GroundHog Day, but with a solid message.
Great story. Good message. Clean and great acting. God bless people for giving us the option to watch good clean entertainment.
Beautiful and sweet movie that will touch your heart! Great acting and script! Unforgettable twists.
Great movie with a unique story line. Not your typical faith-based movie. Very enjoyable and extremely family friendly. Acting was definitely good. Give it a watch. You'll like it too :)

Very interesting and entertaining. Not just a God movie but the name of Jesus is mentioned. This is a Christian movie not just a feel-good, family movie. However, there is not a clear message about the gospel. The movie never tells what Jesus did for us and that he paid the price for our sin and that in order to be saved that you need to repent and make Jesus the Lord of your life. Yet some of this is indirectly demonstrated. WATCH THE MOVIE!
I just watched the movie. I enjoyed every minute of it. :)
I thought it was a great story.  Definitely a modernized story of Joseph.
Amazing! One of the best modern day Joseph movies I have ever seen!

My wife and I purchased 77 CHANCES about a week ago just on a whim. We could not find many reviews on the movie outside of right here on Amazon. I am a Christian movie buff and very selective of the movies I buy, so I was taking a bit of a chance.

I have to say that all in all, 77 CHANCES is one of the best acted, best scripted faith-based movies now in my collection. Great music score as well! Great scriptural message about life, love, forgiveness, and letting go. I was in tears by the last 10-15 minutes of the movie.
HIGHLY recommended!

Hats off to Mr. Tracy Trost and the entire crew behind this one. AWESOME job everyone!
You guys did not get the accolades you deserve for this movie.
Great moving. Worth watching. Child friendly.
Never bought this ????
This is a beautiful story of second chances and letting go of the past in order to move forward into the future.

Great movie! I enjoyed it! It causes one to think about who and what's important in life. We as humans have a tendency to try to keep events from happening. We need to put our trust in God so he can direct us.
Took me several viewings to catch on. Fascinating presentation of Christian teaching about relationships and personal growth. Lots of humor in midst of challenges. Spoke to me personally.

Well acted, poignant story. The theme is a direct retelling of Ground Hog Day, to which the characters give  and during the course of the film. However, I think  that story bears repeating. It alllows for some great character development. The actors are strong enough to carry it off. Very good soundtrack, one of the best movies from a Christian company that I've seen recently.
This is a GREAT movie!  It has it all!  If you or someone you know is stuck in a rut - this is the movie for you!
Slow to start, but thought I would give it a chance. I am so glad I did. Excellent movie!!
Slow starting. I almost called it a waste of money and quit watching it, but I stuck it out. I'll glad I did. It turned out to be a decent movie. Not the best, but still worth watching.

This is one of the best acted,  best storyline Christian movies I've seen.  The message is strong,  it has a few twists & turns, a little action and some tear jerkers toward the end,  but it keeps you involved & presents well.  It has a good scriptural based GODly message & it's family friendly.
Loved this movie
Loved this movie.  Loved the soundtrack.  Does anyone know where to find the music?
